titleStmt.title: A pageant of Spanish humours Wherin are naturally described and liuely portrayed, the kinds and quallities of a signior of Spaine. Translated out of Dutche, By H. w.
titleStmt.author: H. W.

publicationStmt.publisher: By [J. Windet for] Iohn Wolfe, and are to be solde at his shop in Popes-head Alley, neare to the Exchaunge,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Popes-head Alley, neare to the Exchaunge
